meanings.definition: The act or process of writing a script or screenplay.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy learning about scripting in my film class.
meanings.sent2: Scripting is an essential skill for aspiring screenwriters.
meanings.sent3: The students giggled as they practiced scripting funny dialogues.
meanings.sent4: Her scripting of the play was like painting a vivid picture with words.
meanings.sent5: The art of scripting can bring stories to life on the big screen.

meanings.definition: The practice of writing scripts for computer programs or applications.
meanings.sent1: My brother is studying scripting to create software programs.
meanings.sent2: Scripting languages are used to automate tasks in programming.
meanings.sent3: The coding club had a blast scripting a game for the school fair.
meanings.sent4: His innovative scripting revolutionized the way we develop apps.
meanings.sent5: Learning scripting can open up a world of possibilities in tech.
